questions.question: What's your go-to 'jugaad' fix for a production bug at 2 AM?
questions.description: Highlights the innovative problem-solving skills common in Indian tech.

questions.question: If you could replace all office meetings with one Indian dish, what would it be and why?
questions.description: A fun, imaginative question to get the creative juices flowing.

questions.question: What's the best chai-and-samosa pairing to have while debugging?
questions.description: A lighthearted debate starter about the important things in life.

questions.question: What's a non-technical skill that has helped you most in your career?
questions.description: Highlights the importance of soft skills in a technical world.

questions.question: If you had to describe your job using only Bollywood movie titles, what would they be?
questions.description: A fun, modern way to understand what people actually do.

questions.question: What's a piece of technology you wish existed to solve a uniquely Indian problem?
questions.description: A great way to talk about innovation and future possibilities.

questions.question: What's the weirdest thing you've ever named a variable or function?
questions.description: Share funny moments and the quirks of programming.

questions.question: You have to teach a class on a topic you know nothing about. What topic do you choose?
questions.description: A funny hypothetical that explores how people approach learning.

questions.question: What's your go-to 'focus' music?
questions.description: A great way to share music and learn about teammates' work habits.

questions.question: If you could automate one part of your daily life, what would it be?
questions.description: Connects the problem-solving mindset of tech to everyday life.

questions.question: What's a movie or TV show that gets technology right... or hilariously wrong?
questions.description: A fun pop-culture question that everyone can participate in.

questions.question: If you were a font, which one would you be and why?
questions.description: A silly question that can lead to surprisingly deep answers about personality.

questions.question: What's the most useful thing you've learned in the last month?
questions.description: Encourages a culture of continuous learning and sharing.

questions.question: What's a small thing that brings you joy during the workday?
questions.description: A positive and mindful question to foster team bonding.

questions.question: What technology from a sci-fi movie do you hope becomes a reality in your lifetime?
questions.description: A classic question for anyone interested in the future of tech.
